system.description:
Directional microphones and vibration pickup nodes are installed with improved filtering for echoes, wind shear, and machine noise. The Doll can isolate relevant audio signatures faster and with higher confidence.

Effect: When attempting a perception check where hearing is useful, add one kept die.

Rapid implantation of close-quarters engagement heuristics for edged weapons. The Neural Cloud is loaded with optimized distance control, strike sequencing, and pressure-maintenance routines derived from recorded combat data.
Movement optimization and concealment heuristics are refined. The Neural Cloud emphasizes noise discipline, exposure timing, and pathing that minimizes silhouettes and sensor signatures.

A hardened package of combat routines is written into fast-access Neural Cloud partitions. When a firing solution or strike sequence fails, the subroutines trigger an immediate corrective pass, rebuilding the action with updated micro-telemetry.

Effect: Once per scene, reroll a failed Firearms or Blades attack roll.
Creative process frameworks and stylistic references are integrated. This training improves the Doll’s ability to produce, interpret, and adapt artistic works that influence morale and identity.
Nonessential mass is removed and motion systems are refined, enabling faster transitions between movement states without compromising structural integrity.

A modular EW stack is integrated into the Doll’s comms spine and signal processing hardware. It provides intrusion support, traffic shaping, and countermeasure timing, allowing allied operators to push through hostile security layers with stronger execution windows.

Effect: When you or an ally is attempting a Computers check against a hostile force, add a number of kept dice equal to your Fortification rank.

Physical performance profiles are recalibrated in the Neural Cloud. This training optimizes stamina budgeting, movement efficiency, and exertion pacing across climbs, sprints, and sustained load-bearing work.

Stability frameworks are reinforced through stress-response conditioning. The Doll gains improved resistance to panic spirals, coercive interrogation patterns, and hostile signal traffic intended to destabilize the Neural Cloud.
Micro-adjustments to balance points, joint tolerances, and targeting hardware reduce mechanical drift, ensuring consistent alignment during fine motor tasks and weapon operation.

Additional armor bracing and hardened component housings are integrated into vulnerable load paths. The frame is designed to keep operating under sustained fire by preventing cascading damage from reaching critical assemblies.

Effect: When taking fire, increase your Resistance by an amount equal to your Fortification rank.

Linguistic, historical, and social-context datasets are integrated. This training improves navigation of unfamiliar communities and interpretation of symbolic behavior, etiquette, and local power structures.

Procedural knowledge for repair, modification, and improvisation is implanted. The Doll gains immediate familiarity with tool discipline, material substitution, and field-expedient construction under limited resupply conditions.

The frame is retrofitted with predictive microcontrollers and contingency-routing hardware. These systems subtly adjust timing, load distribution, and execution order during high-variance situations, increasing the likelihood that actions resolve favorably when outcomes are uncertain.

Marksmanship routines are reinforced through recoil compensation patterns, reload sequencing, and threat-priority targeting logic. Performance remains stable under stress, poor visibility, and degraded comms.
Vehicle control models and emergency response routines are loaded. This training improves handling precision, recovery from loss-of-traction events, and awareness during transport under fire.
Mechanical schematics and repair workflows are integrated. The Doll gains improved diagnostic speed, calibration intuition, and reliable restoration procedures for field-worn hardware.
Medical assessment and treatment protocols are reinforced. This training improves triage speed, stabilization technique, and efficient use of limited supplies during extended operations.
Real-time battlefield reasoning models are reinforced. This training improves threat evaluation, squad positioning logic, and rapid reprioritization when plans collapse or objectives shift.

Behavioral analysis patterns are reinforced, improving recognition of subtle shifts in tone, posture, and intent. The Doll processes social micro-signals faster and flags inconsistencies with greater confidence.

A controlled fail-operational mode is added to the Doll’s safety architecture. When the frame hits shutdown thresholds, noncritical subsystems are cut and power is redirected to minimal locomotion and combat output, delaying collapse long enough to complete a final action cycle.

Effect: When reduced to 0 Endurance, remain active for one more round before shutting down.

Specialized handling schemas for unconventional weapon systems are integrated into the Neural Cloud. This training focuses on safe operation, activation timing, and compensating for nonstandard balance or recoil profiles.

The Neural Cloud receives calibrated models for blast radius prediction, fuse timing, and placement logic. This enables precise use of explosive devices with reduced setup errors and improved control over enemy movement.

A low-light optical stack is installed with IR sensitivity and adaptive exposure control, allowing the Doll’s vision system to maintain useful detail in darkness without relying on external illumination.

Effect: Vigilance in dark areas does not decrease.

Digital access and intrusion routines are implanted. This training covers encryption handling, credential exploitation, safe traversal of hostile networks, and rapid comprehension of unfamiliar interfaces.
Structural supports and actuators are strengthened, allowing the frame to safely handle greater force output during attacks.

Environmental adaptation models are loaded, covering hazard recognition, scavenging priorities, and shelter logic. The Doll improves route choices and resource discipline in unstable terrain and compromised urban zones.

Shock-management hardware is layered throughout the frame: damped mounts, adaptive load routing, and rapid posture correction when the Doll experiences sudden deceleration. The system is tuned for survivability in chaotic environments where impact is unavoidable.

Effect: Reduce all falling damage you take by half.
Effect: Once per scene, when you would take damage from a collision, explosion, or crash, reduce it by an amount equal to your Fortification rank.

A dedicated social-processing coprocessor is installed to handle facial micro-expressions, cadence control, and context-sensitive affect generation. It reduces latency between perception and response, improving the Doll’s ability to simulate human nuance under scrutiny.

Effect: When attempting to pass as human or emulate nuanced social behavior, add a number of kept dice equal to your Fortification rank.
Effect: Once per scene, you may reroll a failed Insight test made to read another person’s emotions.

A predictive tracking layer is added to the Doll’s sensor fusion stack, using micro-movement cues and pattern inference to flag incoming approach vectors before they become obvious.

Effect: Treat your Vigilance as 1 higher for the purpose of spotting anything trying to sneak up on you.

Secondary actuator bundles are installed along major joints and load paths, providing short-burst torque support when the primary drives approach tolerance limits. The system stays idle most of the time to reduce wear, then engages in a controlled surge during demanding maneuvers.

Effect: Once per scene, add one kept die to a Conditioning or Hand-to-Hand test.
Critical components are shielded with upgraded materials and mounted with impact-absorbing systems, increasing the frame’s tolerance to sustained damage and mechanical stress.

Anchored damping assemblies are installed across the Doll’s core frame, stabilizing against external force. When an impact tries to shove the Doll off position, the system bleeds momentum into controlled flex and friction, preserving footing and orientation.

Effect: When forced to move against your will, reduce the distance moved by half.
Covert mechanical manipulation routines are reinforced. The Doll gains improved control over locks, traps, and sabotage tasks while minimizing telltale noise, delay, and visible disturbance.
Authority projection and directive framing routines are reinforced. This training improves compliance generation, clarity under pressure, and unit cohesion when a firm voice is required.
Close-combat movement libraries and response trees are implanted. The Doll gains refined balance control, leverage timing, and counter sequences suited for confined spaces and emergency engagements.

A low-latency reaction package upgrades the Doll’s perception-to-action pipeline. It prioritizes threat cues, accelerates decision gating, and reduces mechanical delay between intent and motion, improving readiness at the start of engagement.

Effect: When rolling Initiative, add a number of kept dice equal to your Fortification rank.

A magnification and stabilization package is integrated into the Doll’s targeting optics. It improves distant sightlines, reduces jitter, and extends practical engagement clarity beyond standard limits.

Effect: Treat Ideal range of all weapons as 1 range band further, when active.
Dialogue optimization frameworks are reinforced. This training improves bargaining assessment, concession timing, and de-escalation strategies for securing cooperation without resorting to force.

Misleading communication models are implanted. This training improves consistency in false narratives, controlled omissions, and signal misdirection while maintaining plausible emotional and situational congruence.

Analytical frameworks for experimentation and data interpretation are implanted. This training improves hazard analysis, material identification, and the ability to draw useful conclusions from incomplete sensor data.
Persona maintenance and behavioral consistency routines are implanted. This training improves disguise discipline, controlled affect, and the ability to hold a role under scrutiny without slipping.

This module establishes a persistent anchor within the Neural Cloud, keyed to the Commander’s tactical authority signature. The moment the Commander accepts uncertainty or risk, the Doll’s systems align instinctively, capitalizing on the same opening.

Effect: Whenever your Commander spends a Fortune Point, you immediately gain one yourself.

Critical subsystems receive parallel backups and automatic failover routing. The first time the Doll takes catastrophic damage, the redundant architecture absorbs the disruption, keeping function stable while the primary system isolates and locks down.

Effect: Ignore the effects of the first Critical Hit you take in an engagement.
Effect: This system must be repaired during downtime before it can be used again.
